newsblock.title: Newsblock
newsblock.desc: A modern news aggregator that combines ‘topic relevance’ and ‘social trends’ to recommend the best stories.

typesettings.title: Typesettings
typesettings.desc: A CSS preprocessor toolkit that helps set type and elements in Ems with modular scale, vertical rhythm, and responsive ratio based headlines.

joule-solar-energy.title: Joule Solar Energy
joule-solar-energy.desc: Joule Solar Energy needed a consumer facing website that worked across devices to attract new customers and provide resources for current customers.

clear-creek-transit-village.title: Clear Creek Transit Village
clear-creek-transit-village.desc: Clear Creek Transit Village needed a brochure site to help attract investors and provide resources for the CCTV development team.
